outputs.output_descr:
Strategic Area 1: LAND TENURE and RESOURCES
1. By 2010, the policy and planning framework more extensively incorporates effective, cultural  responsive approaches to development policies and planning 
2. Increased capacity of stakeholders to protect/enhance the quality of the environment and sustainably manage natural resources and undertake measures for poverty alleviation. 

Strategic Area 2: GOVERNANCE
 1. Strengthened capacity of indigenous peoples to become partners and implementers of their self-determined development underlined by Indigenous peoples right to self-determination.
2. Increased capacity of government officials to implement national laws and policies that are responsive to indigenous peoples concerns.
3. More participative, accountable and inclusive governance at local and national Levels.

Strategic Area 3:  IP PEACE AGENDA
1. An IP peace agenda anchored on the rights to self-determination, participation and representation clearly formulated and effectively promoted.
2. Recognition of alternative and indigenous conflict and dispute resolution mechanisms.

Strategic Area 4:

project_descr: To promote and protect the rights of IPs to development as recognized by both national and international laws.
project_title: Strengthening Indigeneous Peoples Rights and Development
